entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers early this morning then sunny. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this morning. High 23. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low 8. POP 60%

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 23.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then clearing. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High 23. Humidex 26. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
